    Time Class

    Quick Details

    Property Value
    Class Time
    Namespace cubesat
    File Time.h

    Description

    The Time class provides a convenient way of telling the time, besides using your wrist watch.

    Internally, this class holds the current UTC time as a Modified Julian Day. The same convention is used in COSMOS Web as well.

    See Also

    • Timer Class
    • UTC
    • Julian Day
    • Unix Time
    • ISO 8601

    Member Functions

    Constructor

    Declaration:

    Constructs a new Time object representing the current time.

    Get Current Time

    Declaration:

    Constructs a new Time object representing the current time.

    Get Year, Month, and Day

    Declaration:

    Converts the Time to a year, month, and fractional day.

    Format Time

    Declaration:

    Converts the Time to an ISO 8601 formatted string representation.

    Get Modified Julian Day

    Declaration:

    Returns the UTC time as a Modified Julian Day number.

    Get Unix Seconds

    Declaration:

    Returns the number of Unix seconds represented by this time.

    Get Unix Minutes

    Declaration:

    Returns the number of Unix minutes represented by this time.

    Get Unix Hours

    Declaration:

    Returns the number of Unix hours represented by this time.

    Get Unix Days

    Declaration:

    Returns the number of Unix days represented by this time.
